      • GLColor

        public GLColor(float red,
       float green,
       float blue,
       float alpha)
        Constructor to initialize the color to the specified RGBA
        Parameters:
        red - red value to use, 0-255
        green - green value to use, 0-255
        blue - blue value to use, 0-255
        alpha - control transparency, 0-255
